name: Pip Match
description:
There are red, blue, green, and yellow dice. 

Your goal is to match the values of each die color. 

You start off with one of each color and five wild dice.

You can change the color of wild dice to count towards the color's total.

You have 60 seconds to match the values. Once you succeed, you get an extra 60 seconds and an additional randomly colored die.

See how many levels you can complete before time runs out!
